pr_title: coverage: continue to upload on error

timeline.message:
coverage: continue to upload on error

Signed-off-by: Jose Nino <jnino@lyft.com>

timeline.bodyText: Let's not fold this into this change. I'd also like to discuss before we continue to push this upwards.
timeline.author: goaway
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,11 +21,12 @@ jobs:
       - name: 'Install dependencies'
         run: ./ci/linux_ci_setup.sh
       - name: 'Run coverage'
+        continue-on-error: true
         run: |
           export PATH=/usr/lib/llvm-10/bin:$PATH
           export CC=clang
           export CXX=clang++
-          export COVERAGE_THRESHOLD=95
+          export COVERAGE_THRESHOLD=97

replies.bodyText:
Testing: testing by setting the coverage bar too high in an earlier commit.

Using to test that the report does in fact upload when caused by failing to meet the threshold. I'll revert once the job runs.
replies.author: junr03

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'main' into coverage-upload

Signed-off-by: Jose Nino <jnino@lyft.com>

tar in separate step

Signed-off-by: Jose Nino <jnino@lyft.com>
